participant_1.background:
People say i have a cute laugh.
I am still in love with my ex boyfriend.
I am a female and love to be surrounded by males.
I love to cook for my family and friends.
I working in a publishing building.

participant_2.background:
I have created my own personal religion.
I only buy convertible cars.
I believe in ghosts and have seen them on several occasions.
I do not celebrate any holidays.

content.text: Hi, I'm (participant_1's name)! What's your name?
Nice to meet you! What do you do for fun?
I like to go for long walks in the woods, and I'm also a big fan of convertible cars.
That's cool! I love to cook for my family and friends.
I don't cook much, but I love to eat! What's your favorite dish to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is my favorite! I've been trying to perfect my own recipe for years, but I've never been able to get it quite right.
Oh, I'm sure you'll get it eventually! What's your favorite thing about convertible cars?
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face. It makes me feel free and happy.
That sounds amazing! I can't imagine not celebrating holidays. What's your favorite part of your personal religion?
I love the sense of community and connection that it gives me. It's like being part of a big family.
That sounds really nice. I've always been a little more spiritual than religious, but I can see the appeal of having a community to belong to.
Yeah, it's really important to me. I'm glad you're enjoying your job as a publisher! That sounds like a really interesting field.
It is! I love working with books and stories. It's so rewarding to see a book come to life and be enjoyed by readers.
That's amazing! I'm glad you're so passionate about your work.
